rules_text:
Erupting Peak enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it.
{T}, Remove a depletion counter from Erupting Peak: Add {R}{R}. If there are no depletion counters on Erupting Peak, sacrifice it.
notes:
2k17
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control another land, sacrifice CARDNAME.
T: Add 1M to your mana pool. > CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped with two depletion counters on it.
T, Remove a depletion counter from CARDNAME: Add MM to your mana pool. If there are no depletion counters on CARDNAME, sacrifice it.
